The trend elements can be chosen through careful analysis of ACF and PACF plots looking
at the correlations of recent time steps (e.g. 1, 2, 3). Similarly, ACF and PACF plots can be
analyzed to specify values for the seasonal model by looking at correlation at seasonal lag time
steps.
Seasonal ARIMA models can potentially have a large number of parameters and
